title: roots
content: # `fastmcp.client.roots` ## Functions ### `convert_roots_list` ```python theme={"theme":{"light":"snazzy-light","dark":"dark-plus"}} convert_roots_list(roots: RootsList) -> list[mcp.types.Root] ``` ### `create_roots_callback` ```python theme={"theme":{"light":"snazzy-light","dark":"dark-plus"}} create_roots_callback(handler: RootsList | RootsHandler) -> ListRootsFnT ```
